title: crash? or what?
body: My league for the last day or two has been freezing as soon as i get into games or crashing during champ select is there something i can do to stop this from happening or fix it?

replies.body: Some players have been experiencing a freeze after a recent Windows 10 Update.  The culprit appears to be the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should get this fixed!
how do i disable that? i didnt even know i had that thing
The link will have some instructions, but you may be able to reach the options menu with the game bar open, and disable it through the options pane.  Good luck!

This just happened to me. Game crashed while in champ select, and the system counted it as a dodge and hit me for LP. I was 1 game away from series, now at least 2. I don't even use the Game bar crap. This is the first time in the last year it happened to me and I haven't changed anything, only a new patch for League.{{champion:32}}
